page.title: 02Trumpington
page.content:
{ Trumpington}is mainly residential, and consists mostly of a housing estate which looks fairly badly built. There are a lot of{teenagers}hanging around doing nothing, giving the impression of a run down area.
In mid-afternoon we counted the traffic on the A1310. In one minute 17 cars pass through on the way to Cambridge and 9 cars going South from Cambridge. On average one lorry comes or goes every minute.
{Buses}stop at Trumpington fifteen times a day (to and from Cambridge), from Monday to Saturday. On Sunday buses stop only 7 times. The bus stop is used by 'CAMBUS' and 'NATIONAL EXPRESS'.
